pages.title: Primordial Essence Helmet
pages.text: Gives the wearer 30s of water breathing.

pages.title: Primordial Essence Chestplate
pages.text: Grants the wearer Saturation.$(br)$(br)Equipping the full Primordial Armor set allows the player to fly for a limited amount of time (30s)

pages.title: Primordial Essence Leggings
pages.text: Constantly gives the wearer SPEED II
